item.title: WhatsApp users can now interact with ChatGPT AI chatbot. Here's how - Hindustan Times
item.description:
WhatsApp Now Allows User Interaction with ChatGPT AI Chatbot

Date: Dec 19, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

WhatsApp users can now directly message ChatGPT for answers or creative help with projects, following an update that gives the chatbot its own contact number on the platform.

  • OpenAI announced that anyone globally can message ChatGPT using the new phone number, 1-800-242-8478.
  • Meta recently introduced several new features for WhatsApp, including a new Typing Indicator for enhanced messaging experience.
  • WhatsApp will discontinue support for iOS versions earlier than 15.1 after May 2025.
  • Users can ask ChatGPT questions and receive assistance in creative writing, project planning, recommendations, and general conversations.
  • This feature aims to expand ChatGPT's user base as OpenAI addresses growing operational costs.
OpenAI stated that while the WhatsApp version of ChatGPT can be helpful, it is still an experimental feature.

This new integration offers a familiar platform for users to interact with AI, enhancing accessibility and engagement.

item.title: LG’s transparent OLED TV will put a very visible $60,000 hole in your wallet - The Verge
item.description:
LG’s Transparent OLED TV Launches at $60,000

Publication Date: January 8, 2024 Source: The Verge

LG introduces its Signature OLED T, a transparent TV priced at $59,999, available at select retailers and LG’s official website.

This innovative 77-inch television features both transparent and opaque modes, offering unique software features such as T-Objet, T-Bar, and T-Home for an enhanced user experience.

  • Price: $59,999.
  • Available at select LG-authorized retailers.
  • Features transparent mode for visibility of items behind the screen.
  • Includes unique software features not found in other LG models.
“The OLED T is forever out of reach for mere peasants like myself.” - Author

While the OLED T is a showcase of luxury and technology, its steep price may deter many potential buyers.

item.title: OpenAI makes ChatGPT available for phone calls and texts - CNBC
item.description:
OpenAI makes ChatGPT available for phone calls and texts

Date: December 04, 2024

Source: CNBC

OpenAI has launched a new service that allows users to communicate with its ChatGPT chatbot via phone calls and WhatsApp.

  • Users can call 1-800-CHATGPT (1-800-242-8478) or message via WhatsApp.
  • Initially, users will receive 15 minutes of free use each month.
  • This release comes as part of a series of updates from OpenAI.
  • The company aims to grow its user base by hiring a chief marketing officer.
  • The generative AI market is projected to exceed $1 trillion in revenue by 2032.
  • OpenAI's latest funding round valued the company at $157 billion.
“We’re working on ways to integrate WhatsApp messages with ChatGPT credentials.” - OpenAI Team

This phone and messaging service marks another step in OpenAI's aggressive growth strategy as they compete within the expanding AI landscape.

item.title: Nothing OS 3.0 powered by Android 15 rolls out: New features, improvements for better user experience - The Financial Express
item.description:
Nothing OS 3.0 powered by Android 15 rolls out: New features, improvements for better user experience

Publication Date: not specified Source: Financial Express

The rollout of Nothing OS 3.0 (NOS 3.0) for Phone (2) and Phone (2a) is underway, introducing new features that enhance usability and user experience. The updates are staggered throughout the end of 2024, with additional devices expecting the update in early 2025.

  • New native gallery app with advanced tools for photo organization and editing.
  • Enhanced lock screen with “Shared Widgets” for easier connectivity with friends and new Countdown Widget for productivity.
  • AI-powered Smart Drawer for automatic app categorization.
  • Performance improvements including faster access to functions and enhanced multitasking features.
  • Visual and performance enhancements with smoother animations and modern typography.
“The update introduces a suite of new features and improvements designed for a more personalized experience.”

The launch of Nothing OS 3.0 marks an important step in the evolution of user-friendly interfaces in mobile technology.

item.title: Apple’s Big Foldable iPhone and iPad Plans Revealed: Here’s What To Expect - News18
item.description:
Apple’s Big Foldable iPhone and iPad Plans Revealed: Here’s What To Expect

Date: December 18, 2024
Source: News18

Apple is preparing to enter the foldable device market within the next few years, with plans for both a foldable iPhone and a large foldable iPad. Current reports suggest that the first of these products could be unveiled between 2026 and 2028.

  • The first foldable device is expected to resemble the iPhone with a larger display than the upcoming iPhone 16 Pro Max.
  • A foldable iPad-Mac fusion device with a massive 19-inch display is also in the works.
  • Apple's entry into the foldable segment comes as competitors like Google continue to innovate in this space.
  • The company is also focusing on AI advancements anticipated for rollout in 2025.
“The foldable is a new landscape for all the brands and a fresh start could be the right way to go about it.”

Apple's strategic move into foldable technology represents a significant shift in their product lineup, elevating expectations for innovation in the tech industry.

item.title: Apple Maps is bringing this Google Maps feature on PCs - The Times of India
item.description:
Apple Maps is bringing this Google Maps feature on PCs

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Apple Maps is integrating features similar to Google Maps for its PC users, enhancing user experience and navigation capabilities.

  • Apple Maps is introducing a feature that allows users to view and navigate maps similar to Google Maps on PCs.
  • This move aims to improve accessibility and competition with Google Maps.
  • Refresh in functionality may lead to better user engagement with Apple Maps.
“This integration is a significant step for Apple Maps to be more competitive in the mapping space.”

This new feature signifies Apple’s ongoing efforts to enhance its software and match up to competitors like Google.

item.title: OpenAI Now Lets Few Developers Use 01 Reasoning Model in API - AutoGPT
item.description:
OpenAI Now Lets Few Developers Use 01 Reasoning Model in API

Publication Date: Not specified Source: OpenAI

OpenAI has launched its 01 reasoning model in its API, offering select developers in the “tier 5” usage category access starting December 17, 2024. This model is designed to improve the accuracy of AI responses.

  • The 01 reasoning model performs self-checks on its answers, enhancing reliability.
  • Developers must meet specific criteria, including spending $1,000 with OpenAI and having an established account.
  • New features include function calling, developer messages, reasoning effort parameters, and image analysis.
  • The model is more expensive than previous versions, reflecting its advanced capabilities.
“Even though the pricing and access restrictions might limit its initial adoption, 01’s potential to reshape industries is undeniable.”

The launch of 01 represents a significant advancement in AI, focusing on precision and reliability for developers in various industries.

item.title: New Gmail Security Warning For 2.5 Billion—Second Attack Wave Incoming - Forbes
item.description:
New Gmail Security Warning For 2.5 Billion—Second Attack Wave Incoming

Date: December 18, 2024

Source: Forbes

Google has issued a warning about a second wave of cyber threats targeting Gmail users, advising all 2.5 billion users on how to stay safe. Despite a 35% decrease in phishing attacks compared to last year, Google emphasizes the persistence of attackers and the importance of maintaining security.

Key Points:

  • Google has observed a surge in email traffic since mid-November, increasing the challenge of protecting Gmail inboxes.
  • New AI models have been developed to enhance Gmail's security defenses, blocking 20% more spam and scams.
  • Currently rising scams include Gmail extortion scams, fake invoice scams, and celebrity impersonation scams.
  • Users are advised to take their time, do research, and report suspicious messages to enhance security.
“No reputable person or agency will ever demand payment or your personal information on the spot.” — Andy Wen, Gmail’s senior director of product management

In conclusion, Google remains committed to enhancing user security through advanced technology and user education as cyber threats continue to evolve.

item.title: Nothing OS 3.0 now available for Phone (2) and Phone (2a): Here’s what’s new - The Indian Express
item.description:
Nothing OS 3.0 Now Available for Phone (2) and Phone (2a): Here’s What’s New

Publication Date: December 2024   |   Source: Indian Express

Nothing today announced the rollout of the stable version of Nothing OS 3.0 for the Phone (2) and Phone (2a), which introduces a range of new features and customisation options.

  • Redesigned lock screen with fully customisable options.
  • New gallery app with a minimalistic interface and expanded editing tools.
  • AI-powered features to be added in future updates.
  • New Countdown timer widget and Shared Widgets feature.
  • AI-powered auto-sort functionality for app drawer.
  • Updated quick settings and Enhanced Pop-up view for multitasking.
  • Available for Phone (2) and Phone (2a) by the end of the year; other models will have to wait until next year.
“The new gallery app features a minimalistic and clean interface with expanded editing tools like filter, markup and suggestions.”

Nothing OS 3.0 brings substantial improvements and new functionalities, enhancing the overall user experience for Phone (2) and Phone (2a) users.

item.title: iPhone 15 selling at the lowest price - India Today
item.description:
iPhone 15 Selling at the Lowest Price on Flipkart

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: India Today

Currently, the iPhone 15 is being offered at the lowest price on Flipkart, making it an opportune time for potential buyers.

  • The 128GB model of the iPhone 15 is priced at Rs 58,999, down from Rs 69,999, offering a discount of Rs 11,000.
  • This offer applies to all color models of the iPhone 15.
  • Exchange offers may further reduce the price.
  • The iPhone 15 features a 6.1-inch display and comes in five colors: pink, yellow, green, blue, and black.
  • While it lacks support for Apple Intelligence (AI), it promises a satisfactory experience for users.
  • The device is equipped with a 48-megapixel primary camera for excellent photography in various lighting conditions.
  • Battery life is designed for all-day usage, averaging around 9 hours.
  • The phone is powered by the new A16 Bionic chip that enhances speed and efficiency.
  • Now includes a USB Type-C charging port, replacing the previous Lightning connector.
“Apple says the battery of iPhone 15 is designed for all-day usage.”

This promotional sale on the iPhone 15 provides a significant opportunity for buyers looking to save on a new smartphone.

item.title: JioTag Go launched as India’s first tracker on Google’s Find My Device Network: Steps to set up the devic - The Times of India
item.description:
JioTag Go launched as India’s first tracker on Google’s Find My Device Network: Steps to set up the device

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: Times of India

The JioTag Go is introduced as India's first tracking device integrated with Google’s Find My Device Network, providing users with enhanced tracking capabilities.

  • JioTag Go allows users to track lost items using their smartphones.
  • The device is designed for ease of use and integrates seamlessly with Google’s ecosystem.
  • Setting up JioTag Go involves simple steps outlined by the manufacturer.
“With JioTag Go, we aim to deliver innovative solutions to our customers to help them keep track of their belongings easily.”

The launch of the JioTag Go signifies a leap in personal tracking technology in India, making it a valuable tool for many users.

item.title: Samsung previews upcoming features of OneUI 7: Personal data engine, Now bar and more - The Times of India
item.description:
Samsung previews upcoming features of OneUI 7: Personal data engine, Now bar and more

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: Samsung News

Samsung has unveiled new features for its upcoming OneUI 7, focusing on enhancing user experience with a personal data engine and an integrated Now bar.

  • Introduction of a personal data engine to manage user information efficiently.
  • Development of a Now bar for quick access to shortcuts and notifications.
  • Additional privacy settings to improve user control over personal data.
“Our goal is to give users more control over their information and improve accessibility.”

In conclusion, OneUI 7 aims to redefine the user experience with innovative features while prioritizing user privacy.
